project.description: simple squawk build, from local directory test-ws.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
LD_LIBRARY_PATH=/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386/client:/usr/jdk/instances/jdk1.6.0/jre/lib/i386:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH
$HUDSON_HOME/bin/verifyBuildJars2
java -jar build.jar clean java -jar build.jar copyphoneme java -jar build.jar java -jar build.jar -prod -mac -o2 rom -metadata cldc imp debugger
java -jar build.jar map -cp:cldc/j2meclasses:imp/j2meclasses:debugger/j2meclasses squawk.suite java -jar build.jar genspec java -jar build.jar jvmenv java -jar build.jar systemproperties java -jar build.jar Mnemonics java -jar build.jar OPC java -jar build.jar OperandStackEffect java -jar build.jar Verifier ./squawk -h ./squawk -version $HUDSON_HOME/bin/runsmoketest.sh
/usr/bin/rm -rf tempdoc java -jar build.jar makeapi squawk.suite.api cldc/preprocessed:imp/preprocessed:debugger/preprocessed tempdoc
